lyrics:
8 contributorswe are underused lyricsverse 1
out beyond the call of duty
hold your instincts hostage and stick near me
lets drink a toast
its the most i can stand to cry
about the mental energy you wasted on this wedding invitation
lets thank the host
youve been such a great host
the roast was just so perfectly prepared

chorus
now i know you care
now i know you care
we are underused
we are underused

verse 2
simply put i want to grow old
dying does not meet my expectations
lets drink a toast to all those who arrived alive
to tell about their struggles in hushed tones around a fire
its late winter
lets sink the ship
mix our blood just the tip
a crip is sleeping on the basement stairs
you might also likechorus
oh i know hes there
oh i know hes there
we are underused
we are underused yeah

outro malkmus
we are underused
we are underused
we are underused
we are underused
we are under under under underused
we are under under under underusedembed
